content: What happens when you go here? https://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/product_brief.cfm?product_id=483

The CDA version that David posted is what is currently published for IPS (originally known as INTERPAS). The FHIR version will be published soon (expected this month) and the CI build for that is here.

DG1 is used for different purposes depending on the type of system. Sometimes the purpose is bulking code, sometimes the purpose is to share diagnosis for purpose of an exam etc., and sometimes for the clinical reason for visit.
